name: Citybox
description:
Citybox is a sandbox game where you can build or destroy anything you want with a variety of blocks and items!

 

Controls:

- Left-click to drag and fling objects around.

- Right click to add objects.

- Middle-click to delete objects.

- Hold - or + to slow down or speed up time.

- Space to pause.

- Control + S to save. (working on it)

- Control + L to load. (working on it)

Have fun!
